name: Rocket Box Demo 1.1 hologrunt health version RAMMING SPEED
name_original: Rocket Box Demo 1.1 hologrunt health version RAMMING SPEED
description:
A special demo version of CajunCoding's first game, RocketBox!. Created for hologrunt (www.twitter.com/hologrunt and www.twitch.tv/hologrunt) after his first stream of the game (since he decided to ram into all of the enemies instead of shooting them). Game is still in development; mechanics are in place but content needs to be expanded and polished.

Follow us on Twitter (www.twitter.com/cajun_coding) for updates to this game and our next projects!
